name: Sacred Fire
summary: Deals damage and has a 50% chance of burning the target. If the user is frozen, Sacred Fire will thaw out the user and deal damage.
viability: Sacred Fire is possibly the best Fire-type move in the game. Not only is it powerful, not only does it have good accuracy, but it also has a great secondary effect. Entei and Ho-Oh really have a great move to take advantage of.
